Key Match Events: Enrique Hernandez hit a solo home run in the 2nd inning
Teoscar Hernandez launched a 420-foot home run in the 7th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The contest was the first MLB postseason match-up between two Japanese-born starting pitchers
Others: Yoshinobu Yamamoto pitched five brilliant innings
San Diego Padres failed to score a run in the last 24 innings of the series
